channel.title: 7 World Events that Happened During The Presidential Election?
channel.description: Hi all, so I have this big election project, and the last part was to create a timeline. Here is the instructions. Create a timeline of 7 key events that occurred in the United States or World that affect our country during this time period. No summary is needed. So I have Benghazi, Sandy Hurricane, and Newtown shooting. I was wondering what you all thought would be key events. I only need 7 and I have a few more ideas, I just wanted another opinion and a few other ideas. The time period is September-Inauguration Day:January 20th.

item.title: 7 World Events that Happened During The Presidential Election?

item.source: 7 World Events that Happened During The Presidential Election?

item.title: 7 World Events that Happened During The Presidential Election?
item.dc:creator: @EagleCrest99 EagleCrest99
item.description:
@EagleCrest99 wrote:

It doesn’t have to be world events, but there should be a few, not all to the U.S. I actually finished and came up with:
-Sept. 11-Benghazi attack
-Oct. 5- U.S unemployment drops to lowest point since 2009
-Oct. 29-Hurricane Sandy makes landfall in NJ
-Nov. 4-Pres. Obama is re-elected
-Nov. 9- Petraeus resigns as CIA Director
-Dec. 14-Gunman kills 26 at elementary school
-Jan. 16-At least 41 Engineers are held hostage in Algeria
What do you think? If you guys think there are other events I would still love to hear about them! Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: 7 World Events that Happened During The Presidential Election?
